direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the capitalization of strings but in opposite directions.
Both methods involve modifying the capitalization of strings, though toTitleCase handles multiple words.
Both methods transform strings, but toLowerCase converts all characters to lowercase.
Both methods transform strings, but toUpperCase converts all characters to uppercase.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a string input to operate on.
Environment setup is required before performing string operations.
Both methods verify capitalization and handle similar exceptions.
